name: SUPER 1V1 WIZARD SOCCER
description:
SUPER 1V1 WIZARD SOCCER is a game I made in about 24 hours during a deadline heavy period. Made using the web-based phaser game engine and a few premade assets from Kenney.

In this game you face off against each other in what can only be described as a fast paced, randomized game of pong.

The dog in this game is by far the best feature.

✨🐕🐩🐕‍🦺✨
